commit_scope: Fix generic host-runner paid-provider recovery bugs: treat null retry fields as unset (so OAuth auth-recovery retry can schedule), and normalize Claude CLI model arguments by stripping provider prefixes (claude/...) before execution.
evidence_refs: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_agent_runner_tool_failure_telemetry.py -k "retry_explicitly_disabled or oauth_retry_null_retry_max or apply_claude_model_alias or apply_codex_model_alias or schedules_oauth_retry_on_refresh_token_reused_without_api_key_fallback"

python3 - <<'PY'
import json, urllib.request
API='https://coherence-network-production.up.railway.app'
for tid in ['task_fddd86b53cf1343d','task_99fa12d7dfe369c1','task_4922fdcb7259f375','task_ab6506f28461fc68']:
    with urllib.request.urlopen(f'{API}/api/agent/tasks/{tid}', timeout=20) as r:
        task=json.loads(r.read().decode('utf-8'))
    ctx=task.get('context') if isinstance(task.get('context'), dict) else {}
    print(tid, task.get('status'), (ctx.get('route_decision') or {}).get('executor'), ctx.get('failure_signature'))
PY

phase_gate.blocking_reason: Pending commit/push/PR/deploy and post-deploy hosted paid-provider smoke revalidation.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Codex OAuth recovery retries when retry fields are null (unset), and Claude executor no longer sends unsupported provider-prefixed model IDs to Claude CLI.
test_flows: Re-run paid_codex smoke with executor=codex and verify retry scheduling/terminal success without fallback route.
Re-run paid_claude smoke with executor=claude and verify model alias normalization and successful completion.
Re-run paid_cursor + free_openrouter smoke and compare failure taxonomy/output signatures.
